name: GenerateBundleConfig
description:
configuration that can be applied when generating a new bundle

It can be put in the BundleConfig, but it can also be set manually for an individual Bundle Generation.

isOffline.description: if true, will not clone/pull/push and deploy. No internet is needed, will also not use any `.git` folder.

skipPull.description: skips the step where it gets the new stuff from github

skipPush.description: skips the step where it pushes the new bundle to remote

skipUpsert.description: skips the step where it saves to the db

description.description: descriptioin for git commit, if pushing. Default is "monorepo update"

branchName.description: optionally, specify a custom branch name to pull from / push to / checkout (default is "main")

gitUserEmail.description: Configuration for your commit (needed for vercel deployment)

typeDefinition.description:
configuration that can be applied when generating a new bundle

It can be put in the BundleConfig, but it can also be set manually for an individual Bundle Generation.

simplifiedSchema.description:
configuration that can be applied when generating a new bundle

It can be put in the BundleConfig, but it can also be set manually for an individual Bundle Generation.

schema.description: if true, will not clone/pull/push and deploy. No internet is needed, will also not use any `.git` folder.
skips the step where it gets the new stuff from github
skips the step where it pushes the new bundle to remote
skips the step where it saves to the db
descriptioin for git commit, if pushing. Default is "monorepo update"

push (default): take needed information from project and push to bundle (removing the existing info)

pullReplace: pull bundle and keep its information intact, not taking anything new from the OS, replacing all the information we had from these models in the OS

pullMerge: pull bundle and use its information in conjunction with the information we had in the OS. This option will merge both information sources, removing duplicate IDs

NB: Later we may want to define this setting on a per-model basis!
optionally, specify a custom branch name to pull from / push to / checkout (default is "main")
Configuration for your commit (needed for vercel deployment)
